What is the difference between a heterozygous genotype and a homozygous genotype?
Answer: Heterozygous has two different alleles| homozygous has two identical alleles
Distractor1: Heterozygous has two identical alleles| homozygous has two different alleles
Distractor2: Heterozygous has three alleles| homozygous has two alleles
Distractor3: Heterozygous has one allele| homozygous has two alleles
